strong.h1: We are dedicated to supporting your life abroad
strong.h3: Blue Assistance provides medical assistance and visa/work permit acquisition support services for Japanese customers living overseas.
strong.h4: If you have any concerns, please feel free to contact us.
strong.i1: 19 years of experience in the assistance
strong.read: อ่านเพิ่มเติม

about-section.heading: What is Japanese Medical Desk (JMD)?
about-section.p1: Japanese Medical Desk (JMD) was established to provide 'Japanese-language medical support' for residents living in regions of Thailand and Southeast Asia where medical facilities are not well-equipped.
about-section.p2: We have opened Japanese Medical Desks (JMD) within medical institutions in Thailand, Myanmar, and Laos, where Japanese medical interpreters are stationed to offer Japanese-language medical services.
